Please Note: All included items are shown in the pictures 24221000081 Features: Yamaha's FG series of affordable steel string acoustics has been around since the early '70s. There have been many different FGs over the years, and these guitars have earned a solid reputation for quality at a low price. The FG-340 in specific had a three piece Mahogany back with a Spruce top.
